title: 更多可堆疊1.3.1
author: ccvb1231
txt_content:
更多可堆疊1.3.1
This mod makes saddles, doors, and signs up to 8 in a stack, minecarts and boats up to 4 in a stack. This is great for storage and for using workbenches, chests, or furnaces, as you no longer consume your food! Requires ModLoader 1.3.1.
個mod使馬鞍，門和標誌，至8日在堆疊，minecarts和小船在堆棧4。這是偉大的儲存和使用工作台，櫃，或爐，因為你不再消耗你的食物！需要ModLoader1.3.1。
